addNewItems: Add new items here.  Items will be encrypted on your device then saved.
browseByType: Browse your decrypted information by type of item
inviteContacts: Invite contacts so that you can securely share information with them
manageProfile: Change your account settings including language, public name, password, email address or plan
notificationIntro: Updates to shared items or requests for sharing will be displayed here in the notifications area
